Support.title: Support
Support.contactDescription: Have questions or need help? Reach out to us through any of the following channels.
Support.businessHoursDetails:
Saturday - Thursday: 12:00 PM - 7:00 PM (CST)
Fridays: Limited support available
Support.faqDescription: Find quick answers to common questions about using the dashboard.
Support.faq1Question: How do I create a new brand?
Support.faq1Answer: Navigate to the Brands page from the sidebar menu. Click the 'Add Brand' button, enter the brand name in the form, and click 'Add Brand' to save. Your new brand will appear in the brands list.
Support.faq2Question: How do I add a new product?
Support.faq2Answer: Go to the Products page and click 'Add Product'. Fill in the required fields including brand, model name, category, image, flavor, MG, and code type. All fields marked with * are required. Click 'Add Product' to save.
Support.faq3Question: How do I generate QR codes for my products?
Support.faq3Answer: Visit the Code Generator page. Create a new batch by entering a batch name and description. Add products to your batch by selecting them and specifying quantities. Review your batch and click 'Generate Batch' to queue the QR code generation.
Support.faq4Question: How can I download generated QR codes?
Support.faq4Answer: After generating a batch, go to the Batch History section on the Code Generator page. Find your completed batch and click the 'Download' button to download all QR codes as a ZIP file.
Support.faq5Question: How do I manage user accounts?
Support.faq5Answer: Access the Users page from the sidebar (admin access required). You can add new users, edit existing user details, change roles, and delete users. Each user can be assigned to a specific brand.
Support.faq6Question: What are the different user roles?
Support.faq6Answer: There are three roles: Super Admin (full access to all features and brands), Admin (can manage products and generate codes), and User (limited access based on assigned brand).
Support.faq7Question: How do I change my password?
Support.faq7Answer: Click on your profile icon in the top right corner and select 'Account Settings'. On the Profile page, use the 'Change Password' section to enter your current password and set a new one.
Support.faq8Question: What image formats are supported for products?
Support.faq8Answer: Product images support JPEG, PNG, GIF, and WebP formats. The maximum file size is 5MB. For best results, use high-quality images with a square aspect ratio.
Support.tip1Description: Create brands first, then add products under each brand for better organization.
Support.tip2Description: Generate QR codes in batches to save time. You can include multiple products in one batch.
Support.tip3Description: Download your QR code batches regularly to maintain backups of generated codes.
Support.tip4Description: Assign users to specific brands to limit their access and maintain data security.
